snippet.title: Official Soulcalibur Unbreakable Soul (iOS / Android) Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Soulcalibur Unbreakable Soul / ソウルキャリバー アンブレイカブル ソウル by NamcoBandai Games Inc. (iOS / Android)

SOULCALIBUR is Back, All-New and Free to Play!

The pinnacle of weapon-based fighting games is reborn!Draw your sword and take to the arena of SOULCALIBUR's high-fidelity 3D world--all with the touch of a single finger!
New Chapters of the Eternal Tale Revealed

* The Franchise's Signature Story-Telling Takes New Twists

Follow Cassandra and the Edge Master in search of fragments of the dreaded blade, Soul Edge. An all-new story unfolds as you acquire powerful weapons and avatars to aid your quest!

* Build the Ultimate Deck from a Rich Assortment of Cards

A bold roster of over 150 avatars including familiar SOULCALIBUR faces is at your command! Mix and match with 200+ weapons to forge an invincible deck like no other!
150+ Avatars and 200+ Weapons
Easy Controls Meet Exhilarating Combat

* A Revamped Battle System Melds Ease with Lightning Action

Time your attacks for a damaging barrage, creating openings that allow you to obliterate opponents with a single, jaw-dropping finisher! All it takes is a simple card tap!
Remain Neutral to Automatically Guard
Combine Cards to Create Powerful New Moves
Weapons Span 5 Elements: Fire, Aqua, Wind, Light and Dark

* New Features to Come

A heated versus mode pitting player against player, deck against deck, in intense ranked battles!

* Playable on Your iPhone or iPad

■Compatibility

[Recommended OS version]
Requires iOS 5.1 or later.

[Recommended model]
iPhone4S、iPhone5、iPad2、iPad（3rd Gen）、iPad(4th Gen）、iPad mini、iPod Touch（5th Gen）、iPhone5C、iPhone5S、iPadAir、iPad mini with Retina display

SOULCALIBUR Unbreakable Soul is an online game and requires an Internet connection to play.

Caution: Deleting the app without first linking to an account will result in the permanent loss of your save data. Make sure to link to an account before playing.

[Disclaimer]
(1) Operation is not supported for the models and OS versions other than those recommended.
(2) Depending on your usage, there may be cases where operation is unstable even with the recommended models.
(3) Regarding recommended OS versions, although it says [iOS5.1.1 or later] this does not guarantee that it will support the latest OS version.

[Latest recommended models and other inquiries]
http://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/english/faq_list/1459
*English support only

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/soulcalibur-unbreakable-soul/id805384048

Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=BANDAI%20NAMCO%20Games&hl=EN (Launching Soon on Android)

Homepage:

http://www.soularchive.jp/soulus/jp/
